home.title: Rio Nagata
home.aboutText: I am a 24-year-old programmer with 5 years of combined academic, self-taught and professional experience. My passion for creating websites and software began in junior high school and has grown through both individual projects and collaborative team work. I hold a Bachelor of Information Technology from Griffith University and bring an international perspective, having lived in Australia for more than 10 years. I am fluent in English, Japanese, and Tagalog, which allows me to communicate effectively across diverse cultures and environments.
home.programmingSkillsDesc: These are the programming-related skills I’ve learned and used, rated from 1-5.
home.otherSkillsDesc: Skills outside programming that reflect my soft and professional capabilities.

chat.title: Chat Channel
chat.description: This webpage has a login form, chat feature, and CRUD for users. The languages used are HTML, CSS, Angular(TypeScript), Node.js(JavaScript), and MongoDB.

gamereport.title: Game Report
gamereport.description: This website is a report website using entries submitted to Gravity Forms to display reports on table, chart, and also display entries.
gamereport.type: Project Type: Website (HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, Gravity Form Database)

hiraganafun.title: Hiragana Fun
hiraganafun.description: This is an iOS application that my team member and I created during my university internship. I was the leading developer for this team. This app has no source code since the company has full authority over this application.

vehicle.title: Vehicle Booking Page
vehicle.description: This webpage consists of a Booking feature and CRUD for users. The languages used are HTML, CSS, Laravel (PHP), and MySQL.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Welcome to my portfolio. Here you’ll find a selection of my work. Explore my projects to learn more about what I do.
